items.title: Lockheed Martin says ‘disappointed’ in outcome of Air Force contract decision
items.description: Lockheed Martin (LMT) issued the following statement after Boeing (BA) was selected to build a new, next-generation U.S. Air Force fighter jet: “Lockheed Martin continues to work to advance critical technologies to outpace emerging threats and deliver true 21st Century Security solutions to our nation’s military forces. We are committed to advancing the state of the art in air dominance to ensure America has the most revolutionary systems to counter the rapidly evolving threat environment. While

items.title: Boeing’s double dose of good news: Fighter jets and cash
items.description: A positive outlook on cash flow and a deal to build the U.S. Air Force's next-generation fighter jet were part of a strong week for aerospace giant Boeing.

items.title: What Moved Markets This Week
items.description: The U.S. stocks snapped a four-week losing streak on Friday as the S&P 500 barely moved into positive territory. Read more about this week's major events on Wall Street.

items.title: Three years after China Eastern plane crash, regulator has not released report
items.description: China's aviationregulator has not released an expected update on itsinvestigation into a deadly China Eastern Airlinescrash three years ago, leaving relatives and the aviationindustry with no...
